entry.string: The Xaraya MLS is a tool to automate the translation process for Xaraya. The process roughly consists of two parts:
entry.translation: Zee Xereya MLS is a tuul tu ootumete-a zee trunsleshun prucess fur Xereya. Zee prucess ruooghly cunseests ooff tvu perts:

entry.string: The translating proces consists of the following steps:
entry.translation: Zee trunsleteeng pruces cunseests ooff zee fullooeeng steps:

entry.string: Choosing the language (locale) to work on
entry.translation: Chuuseeng zee lungooege-a (lucele-a) tu vurk oon

entry.string: Generating / updating skeletons for the chosen locale and subsystem
entry.translation: Genereteeng / updeteeng skeletuns fur zee chusee lucele-a und soobsystem

entry.string: Translating the terms found in the elements for the subsystem
entry.translation: Trunsleteeng zee terms fuoond in zee ilements fur zee soobsystem

entry.string: The generating and packaging process consists of the following steps:
entry.translation: Zee genereteeng und peckegeeng prucess cunseests ooff zee fullooeeng steps:

entry.string: Generating the translation, giving an overview of the translated items
entry.translation: Genereteeng zee trunsleshun, geefing un ooferfeeoo ooff zee trunsleted items

entry.string: Packaging the generated translation in a downloadable archive
entry.translation: Peckegeeng zee genereted trunsleshun in a doonluedeble-a ercheefe
